mapper.delete:
delete from t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out where ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out set ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id=#{exRecSingleInstructionOutId}, ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id=#{exRecSingleInstructionInId}, ex_bank_type_code=#{exBankTypeCode}, ex_agency_code=#{exAgencyCode}, ex_tx_pack_no=#{exTxPackNo}, ex_order_id=#{exOrderId}, ex_order_no=#{exOrderNo}, ex_order_bank_no=#{exOrderBankNo}, ex_bank_sequence=#{exBankSequence}, ex_bank_status=#{exBankStatus}, ex_iRet_code=#{exIretCode}, ex_iRet_message=#{exIretMessage}, modifier=#{modifier}, last_modifi_time=#{lastModifiTime},
where ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id = #{exRecSingleInstructionOutId}
mapper.select: select ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id AS exRecSingleInstructionOutId, ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id AS exRecSingleInstructionInId, ex_bank_type_code AS exBankTypeCode, ex_agency_code AS exAgencyCode, ex_tx_pack_no AS exTxPackNo, ex_order_id AS exOrderId, ex_order_no AS exOrderNo, ex_order_bank_no AS exOrderBankNo, ex_bank_sequence AS exBankSequence, ex_bank_status AS exBankStatus, ex_iRet_code AS exIretCode, ex_iRet_message AS exIretMessage, creator AS creator, modifier AS modifier, create_time AS createTime, last_modifi_time AS lastModifiTime from t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out where ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id = #{exRecSingleInstructionOutId}

select ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id AS exRecSingleInstructionOutId, ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id AS exRecSingleInstructionInId, ex_bank_type_code AS exBankTypeCode, ex_agency_code AS exAgencyCode, ex_tx_pack_no AS exTxPackNo, ex_order_id AS exOrderId, ex_order_no AS exOrderNo, ex_order_bank_no AS exOrderBankNo, ex_bank_sequence AS exBankSequence, ex_bank_status AS exBankStatus, ex_iRet_code AS exIretCode, ex_iRet_message AS exIretMessage, creator AS creator, modifier AS modifier, create_time AS createTime, last_modifi_time AS lastModifiTime from t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out where ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id = #{exRecSingleInstructionOutId}

select t.ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id AS ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id, t.ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id AS ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id, t.ex_bank_type_code AS ex_bank_type_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exBankTypeCode' and code = t.ex_bank_type_code) AS ex_bank_type_desc, t.ex_agency_code AS ex_agency_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exAgencyCode' and code = t.ex_agency_code) AS ex_agency_desc, t.ex_tx_pack_no AS ex_tx_pack_no, t.ex_order_id AS ex_order_id, t.ex_order_no AS ex_order_no, t.ex_order_bank_no AS ex_order_bank_no, t.ex_bank_sequence AS ex_bank_sequence, t.ex_bank_status AS ex_bank_status, t.ex_iRet_code AS ex_iRet_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exIretCode' and code = t.ex_iRet_code) AS ex_iRet_desc, t.ex_iRet_message AS ex_iRet_message, t.creator AS creator, t.modifier AS modifier, t.create_time AS create_time, t.last_modifi_time AS last_modifi_time from t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out t where ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id = #{exRecSingleInstructionOutId}

select t.ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id AS ex_rec_single_instruction_out_id, t.ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id AS ex_rec_single_instruction_in_id, t.ex_bank_type_code AS ex_bank_type_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exBankTypeCode' and code = t.ex_bank_type_code) AS ex_bank_type_desc, t.ex_agency_code AS ex_agency_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exAgencyCode' and code = t.ex_agency_code) AS ex_agency_desc, t.ex_tx_pack_no AS ex_tx_pack_no, t.ex_order_id AS ex_order_id, t.ex_order_no AS ex_order_no, t.ex_order_bank_no AS ex_order_bank_no, t.ex_bank_sequence AS ex_bank_sequence, t.ex_bank_status AS ex_bank_status, t.ex_iRet_code AS ex_iRet_code, (select code_desc from where code_type = 'exIretCode' and code = t.ex_iRet_code) AS ex_iRet_desc, t.ex_iRet_message AS ex_iRet_message, t.creator AS creator, t.modifier AS modifier, t.create_time AS create_time, t.last_modifi_time AS last_modifi_time from t_ex_rec_single_instruction_out t
